ServicesSection.title: From Design to Turnkey Delivery
ServicesSection.description: We don't just manufacture equipment; we take the burden off your shoulders. Our expert team coordinates every step of the process so you only need to attend the handover.

features.name: Custom Design.
features.description: We create visual plans based on on-site surveys, considering safety zones and budget constraints.

features.name: Premium Manufacturing.
features.description: We manufacture certified equipment in our own facility using selected wood and metal materials with CNC technology.

features.name: Professional Installation.
features.description: Our own installation team handles concreting, impact-absorbing surfacing, and equipment fixation.

WhyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Terra Forte?
WhyChooseUs.description: We are dedicated to creating playgrounds that stand out for their quality, safety, and custom solutions. Here is why our partners choose us:

features.title: Local Expertise and Reliability
features.description: As a Hungarian-owned business with over 10 years of experience, we understand local needs and standards. Personal connection and trust come first for us.

features.title: Strict Safety Compliance
features.description: All equipment manufactured and installed by us possesses the necessary MSZ EN 1176 certification. Child safety is not an option for us, but a fundamental requirement.

features.title: Full Customisation
features.description: We offer more than just catalogue products. Our flexible manufacturing technology allows us to tailor the playground to the specific location and budget.

features.title: Durability and Quality
features.description: We work with selected, UV-resistant, and weather-proof materials to ensure our playgrounds serve the community for generations with minimal maintenance.

Hero.title: Building Community Spaces for Over 10 Years.
Hero.subtitle: The story of Terra Forte Bau Kft. is about passion, safety, and local expertise. Our goal is to create playgrounds that bring joy to children for generations.

Stats.title: Reliability in Numbers
Stats.subtitle: We are proud of our achievements and the trust of our partners.

Mission.subtitle: With our own manufacturing capacity and installation team, we control every step of the process.
Mission.description_p1: At Terra Forte Bau, we believe a playground is more than just a collection of equipment. It is the scene of childhood, a source of joy in movement, and a meeting point for the community.
Mission.description_p2_post: , we pay special attention to ensuring our products not only meet EU standards but also fit aesthetically into the environment, whether it's a modern residential park or a forest school.

Values.title: Our Core Values
Values.subtitle: These are the pillars upon which we build every project.

items.name: Safety Above All
items.description: We make no compromises when it comes to children. All our equipment meets the strictest MSZ EN 1176 standards.

items.name: Innovative Materials

items.name: Community Building
